    • Method Detail

      • clearAccountDarkImage

        @POST(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-images/dark/{reference}/clear")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Void> clearAccountDarkImage(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                     @Path(value="reference",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String reference)
        Revert an image to dark theme default. Revert an account branding image to dark theme default. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-images/dark/{reference}/clear \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        reference - Name of the branding images (icon or picture). (required)
        Returns:
        Call<Void>

      • clearAccountLightImage

                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String reference)

        Parameters:

                                                                                                                               java.lang.String reference)

        Parameters:

      • uploadAccountDarkImage

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:image/png")
 @POST(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-images/dark/{reference}/upload")
retrofit2.Call<BrandingImage> uploadAccountDarkImage(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                                                                 @Path(value="reference",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String reference,
                                                                                                                                                                                 @Body
                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String body)
        Upload a dark theme image. Upload a new account dark theme branding image in PNG or JPEG format. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-images/dark/{reference}/upload \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' -H 'content-type: image/png' --data-binary '@myimage.png' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        reference - Name of the branding images (icon or picture). (required)
        body - The image in PNG or JPEG format. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<BrandingImage>

      • uploadAccountDarkImageMultipart

        @Multipart
 @POST(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/branding-images/dark/{reference}/upload-multipart")
retrofit2.Call<BrandingImage> uploadAccountDarkImageMultipart(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                                                      @Path(value="reference",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String reference,
                                                                                                                                                                      @Part
                                                                                                                                                                      okhttp3.MultipartBody.Part image)
        Upload a dark theme image. Upload a new account dark theme branding image as form data in PNG or JPEG format.
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        reference - Name of the branding images (icon or picture). (required)
        image - The image in PNG or JPEG format as multipart form data. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<BrandingImage>
